name: Triflex
description: Triflex Token is a community driven, deflationary utility token deployed on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC-BEP20). $TRFX is the fundamental token of the Triflex Ecosystem consisting of a series of smart contracts that make up the Triflex Protocol. The deflationary nature of the token contract will be achieved via a Buy Back and Burn from the tax-based tokenomics structure. The default reward is the native $TRFX token. Holders will utilize our revolutionary dashboard where they will be able to choose their reward from a selection of BEP20 tokens which will be automatically delivered to the holderâ€™s associated wallet address periodically. See the Whitepaper for additional information.
